title: Tiafoe's Tournament
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if Frances Tiafoe is now the men’s favorite at the US Open, how important winning the division is to the Mets and Braves, if they think Patrick Beverly and Russell Westbrook will get along and Booger McFarland joins the show for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Booger McFarland joins the show and is Tiafoe the favorite at the US Open?
